description:
What was supposed to herald a new era of AI for Apple has instead left many underwhelmed when the tech giant unveiled the iPhone 16 series, its first AI-powered smartphone line-up, which happens to be still in beta testing and expected to take months, if not years, to fully roll out globally. To make matters worse... Read more »

The post Has Huawei outsmarted Apple in the AI race? appeared first on AI News.
title: Has Huawei outsmarted Apple in the AI race?
